creator: Heinz-Dieter.Richter@wit.siemens.de
text:
I tried FOP 0.20.1 (on the commandline) and found that the bookmark extension 
(fox:outline, fox:label) does not work (in FOP 0.18.1 it did). Running FOP 
0.20.1, there is no error reported but opening the PDF-File in AcrobatReader 
5.0, the bookmark column is empty.

FWIW, I found the same (that it didn't work with the FOP 0.20.1 release build, 
but that it did work after building FOP from xml-fop_20010927161603.tar.gz. As 
a learning exercise, I may try to spent a bit of time figuring out what the 
difference is.
creator: nate@nateweiss.com
keiron@aftexsw.com
text: This was broken due to the stream renderer changes. It works in 0.20.2

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
